ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="47519-4" History of Procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] title and SHOULD equal "History of Procedures"

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Such entries SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS)
Such entries MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship, where its type is ED Context Reference Entry
ED procedures (eOutcome.09) should be identified with this relationship; hospital procedures (eOutcome.12) should not
